data.name: Project Outbreak Demo
data.short_description: This is the demo for Project Outbreak, experience two maps, a wide range of weapons, and climb the leaderboards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB, or Radeon HD 7850 2GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, or AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts non-realistic violence and blood.
